string.text: Escort Jupiter Scientists
Scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp.
We need an experienced stalker to lead a few of our the colleagues out into the field for study. Are you up for the task?
Thank you for your protection, stalker. Please, take this as a token of our gratitude.
Find the %s Artefact for Hermann
You have been asked to retrieve the %s artefact. Bring it back to {npc_name} if you happen to get your hands on one.
None
We are looking for a certain kind of artefact, specifically a %s. You ever heard of it? If you can find one, we have something we can give you in return that I think you will find useful.
Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for. Take this suit, it offers great protection against the Zone and I'm sure you can command a good price for it.
Find Transistors for Hermann
{npc_name} needs transistors. They may exist inside one of the local abandoned buildings.

There is some electronic equipment we need, but have been unable to obtain. It is quite possible the parts we need can be found inside an abandoned building not far from here, but it is not an easy place to get into. If you are willing to search for them I can pay you.
Thank you stalker!
Recover Stolen PDA for Hermann
Hermann had a PDA stolen that contained important research. Find it and return it to him.

Bandits broke into one of our mobile labs and looted it. One of the things they took was a PDA that has some research data on it that is very important. I have received a tip as to where they might have stashed it. Check it out. If you find the PDA I will reward you for its return.
Excellent! You have done well.
Brains vs Brawn
Lead a group of Ecologist guards into battle against Bandits.

My researchers are in constant peril. There are bandits all over the area and the Military doesn't seem to be able to do a damn thing about it. I want you to clear the area with some of my men. Don't let their A-levels fool you, these boys know how to fight. Now get out there and lead them to victory!
Excellent work. Thank you.
